content.query:
-- Run against built serverless - TPCDSDBDemo

USE TPCDSDBDemo
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.symmetric_keys WHERE symmetric_key_id = 101)
BEGIN
	CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'P2ssw0rd2903$';
END
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [SasADLSDemoDatabaseScoped]
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
     SECRET = '?sv=2021-06-08&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2099-09-07T05:53:48Z&st=2022-09-06T21:53:48Z&spr=https&sig=IhkV0ds%2BMpkJs3B9u49l2lWo8jp1ADTnCJg05lE6WAw%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [TPCDataSource] WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://azrawdatalakeash.blob.core.windows.net/tpcds', CREDENTIAL = [SasADLSDemoDatabaseScoped]
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [FF_Parquet] WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO
